summary: This is an email chain from February 2019 regarding updates on human trafficking cases, specifically requesting status updates on the Epstein case and mentioning the recently opened R. Kelly case. It involves coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: R Kelly
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a recently opened human trafficking case by the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Request for Epstein case update
events.description: An email requests an update on the status of the Epstein human trafficking investigation from the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Opening of R. Kelly investigation
events.description: The document notes that the office has recently opened a human trafficking case on R. Kelly.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from February 2019 discussing human trafficking cases within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
It specifically requests an update on the status of the Epstein case investigation.
It mentions that the office has recently opened a human trafficking investigation into R. Kelly.
The correspondence indicates ongoing coordination and oversight of high-profile human trafficking cases at that time.
